abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +edge using your chain to disarm, trip, stun, or push back your opponent, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} by first entangling your opponent then slashing, choose one (decide before rolling).

  • Get over here: Roll +edge. On a weak hit, you retain initiative.
  • Finish them: Roll +iron. A weak hit counts as a miss. On a strong hit, you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.aac3783710ad7499]{End the Fight} and reroll any challenge dice.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} against multiple opponents, you may add +1. If you do and score a hit, inflict I harm (instead of 2 harm) and you have the initiative.
